author: CHAMPION
comment: After the new update i thought it was my phone or my Bluetooth speaker that made the app pause after 9, 10 minutes. I tried it with 2 phones and 2 Bluetooth speakers and it wasn't either one. I think thetes a glitch on the new tune in update thats makes it pause for no reason. Please fix i love the app

author: Paul Bergman
comment: Radio from your whole town and your home world! I had the premium for a while but removing the audio books is a big mistake. Bring those books back and it be happy to pay a monthly rate. Not worth it just for live sports.

author: Randy Due
comment: I like radio. Tunein makes it easy to find online stations. Was reluctant to pay ten bucks to remove ads and get the ability to record but am glad I did. The record feature is handy. When I hear something I want to save, just rewind and press record...cool! Good app.

Wow you guys have fallen. Bought pro a few years ago. Watched you destroy the UI, remove app features and also f-over your Pro payers like me. Now I open the app to a massive subscription request where you want me to pay for a yearly premium subscription for a hilarious €115 annually? There's a tiny little X at the top to close it. God help anyone who falls for it. You've also changed the Logo AGAIN to something even more ugly. Audio books are gone and now you inject ads before my stream despite me paying for this. Disgraceful. The UI looks like trash. I'll be deleting my account and telling everyone to stay away. Rot in hell.

author: Craig F
comment: Nice to be able to listen to programs of interest. However when I record a show to listen later, there are many gaps in the program and doesn't seem to record the complete show.

author: David Haylett
comment: New design is an improvement but issues raised six months ago still exist. Rather fed up with raising them and nothing happens.

author: Hector Lopez
comment: The latest update creates confusion with the first premium purchased screen. You need to add a skip button or no thanks. Didn't notice the little x on the right top at first time.

author: Dan Price
comment: The app itself is great but why is there now ads before every stream I start? The reason why I originally paid for this app was to not get ads anymore.

author: Kevin Dalton
comment: Trying to cram too many things into one app. Just give me good radio streaming...

author: Charita S.
comment: Mid Atlantic stations NOT availible via iHeart are here (and vice versa) which means I have 2radio apps. I need to know what all occurs in our Nations capital daily. TuneIn makes that possible.

author: Brian J. Morgan
comment: I love this app and use it every day. Can we please get the option added back that allowed saving recordings to the SD card? Some phones still have limited internal storage.

author: Warren Foster
comment: Grooveyard Radio Link is awesome! Finding several great online radio stations!Tried others & came back. Still A+

author: Nathaniel Segel
comment: Really good app. The human interface not very good

reply.author: TuneIn Inc
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback, Nathaniel. In the Settings menu, you can choose to default to the lowest quality stream for each station.

author: Christopher Lincoln
comment: Paid for the app, now wants a subscription? Ask your advertisers. Bye.

author: Spehmaster G.
comment: Please bring back the round Black TuneIn Pro Icon.. I preferred it.

author: A Google User
comment: Allow user to change background color, enable dark theme. Miss the previous total black background that earlier versions had.

author: De Anna Dove
comment: I really like this app but does have the tendency to skip and repeat while playing.

author: Rick Faulconer
comment: Needs a larger buffer option than 30 seconds

author: Alan Wally
comment: I am a pro user who paid. Now I am forced to upgrade to premium??? There are BETTER options out there

author: Ricardo Gomez
comment: Me gusta poder escuchar mis estaciones de radio favoritas

author: Craig LB
comment: My go-to app for all pod casts & internet stations. Perfect for my use!

author: Colin Block
comment: It would be nice to have the favourites page more immediately accessible. Excellent app

author: Mapra Blavkm
comment: Google login is not working anymore

author: Elmer Borrayes
comment: Awesome that we can record our fav programs and podcasts available too.

author: MadBrax
comment: Still the best radio app available, been using it for several years..

author: Marcelo Portillo
comment: SoundHound integration please.

author: Richard Wilson
comment: very good radio player worth the annual fee to remove ads

author: Jeroen Koster
comment: My favourite live radio app. Also good for podcast listening.

author: Johnny Cortes
comment: Great app to have all the audio that you love.

author: Vince A
comment: A++ app

author: A Google User
comment: Samsung Galaxy s7

reply.author: TuneIn Inc
reply.content: Android TV requires access to the mic in order to use their Voice Search functionality from their remote. The camera permission was introduced last year for you to upload your profile photo. Thank you!

author: Rodrigo Silva
comment: Thanks for fixing the recording bug. Great app!

author: Jose Antonio
comment: One of my favorite apps of all time

author: john emanuel
comment: A dark mode would be nice

reply.author: TuneIn Inc
reply.content: Sorry for the frustration! If the stream gets stuck in 'Opening' this is a known issue that will be fixed in our upcoming release. Thank you for your patience in the meantime!

author: Hon Nii-Amasah Namoale
comment: I love it so much

author: Ariel Albalansi
comment: Great app grrat music

author: Niko Riutto
comment: SMH

author: Mindaugas Zapkus
comment: Like Love

author: A Google User
comment: Nice app

author: Rob B
comment: Works great
